history.narrative: Law 4-71, the “Cigarette Tax Amendment Act of 1981,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-152, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 27, 1981 and November 10, 1981, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 2, 1981, it was assigned Act No. 4-118 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
